item.title: .NET Conf 2023 - Alpha Science Lab
item.description: Alpha Science Lab is non-profit organization making innovation and research approachable in the diversified engineering field including software, hardware, IoT and more. Join us at ".NET Conf 2023 - Alpha Science Lab" to discover how .NET empowers developers, fuels creativity, and sparks innovation. As we celebrate the remarkable capabilities of .NET, we invite you to: Explore the limitless possibilities of this versatile framework. Connect with industry leaders and fellow enthusiasts. Gain insights into the latest trends and best practices. Witness firsthand the impact of .NET on engineering and technology. Secure your spot now and be a part of this exciting journey that promises to reshape the future of engineering through the power of .NET Save the date 18-11-2023 11:00 AM UTC + 6 on your calendar!

item.title: 5x with the Uno Platform - Nick's .NET Travels
item.description: Just over a week ago the Uno Platform released v5.0 which was another significant update, following the 4.10 release that included Adding .NET MAUI Controls to an Existing Uno-Platform Application, and some awesome support for shadows. In this post we’re going to do a wrap up of the release and look at trajectory of the platform. ... Read more

item.title: Blockchains and the Future of AI
item.description: The world is shaped by periods in which extraordinary upheavals in technology or infrastructure coincide, unleashing a generational step function in innovation. Think telegraphs and railroads, fiber-optic cables and the internet, or mobile phones and 3G.
